          <title>
            <string language="en">Heating of water using different fuels</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizung des Wassers mit unterschiedlichen 
Kraftstoffen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chauffage de l'eau en utilisant différents 
carburants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Heating da água usando combustíveis diferentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Heating dell'acqua usando i combustibili 
differenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζέσταμα του ύδατος που χρησιμοποιεί τα διαφορετικά 
καύσιμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calefacción del agua usando diversos combustibles</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is first of two illustrations showing experimental set-ups used in testing which fuel heats water the most. This set-up uses a liquid fuel.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">clamp</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermometer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist erstes von zwei Abbildungen, welche die 
experimentellen Installationen zeigen, die wenn es prüft verwendet 
werden, welcher Kraftstoff das Wasser erhitzt, das am meisten ist. 
Diese Installation benutzt einen Flüssigbrennstoff.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est premier de deux illustrations montrant des 
installations expérimentales utilisées en testant quel carburant 
chauffe l'eau plus. Cette installation utilise un combustible 
liquide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é primeiro de duas ilustrações que mostram 
as instalações experimentais usadas em testar que combustível 
aquece a água mais. Esta instalação usa um combustível 
líquido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è una prima di due illustrazioni che mostrano
le messe a punto sperimentali usate nella prova quale combustibile 
riscalda l'acqua più. Questa messa a punto usa un combustibile 
liquido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι πρώτη δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν 
πειραματικές οργανώσεις που χρησιμοποιούνται στη δοκιμή που ύδωρ 
θερμοτήτων καυσίμων πιό πολύ. Αυτή η οργάνωση 
χρησιμοποιεί υγρά καύσιμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es primer de dos ilustraciones que muestran 
las disposiciones experimentales usadas en la prueba de qué 
combustible calienta el agua más. Esta disposición utiliza un 
combustible líquido.</string>
          </description>
